summary: Adds a small player-owned hut in Dushnikh Yal, the Orc Stronghold southeast of Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
Current Version: 1.0.0

If you want to incorporate this mod in a mod of your own, go ahead.  No need to ask, just use it as your heart desires.

------ Description ------

Ever wished you could live in a Stronghold among the Orcs?  Me too!  That\'s why I made this mod.

The hut is located in Dushnikh Yal, next to the farm.  Just walk to the right around the Longhouse, up the wooden steps, and you can\'t miss it.

Currently, the hut contains a bed and some player storage, including a strongbox and shelf.  Around the side of the hut is a small balcony with a tanning rack and some additional storage. All furniture and architecture is in the Orcish style, so it\'ll fit right in with the surrounding homes.

In the basement you\'ll find an enchantment table and a reading area.

There is no quest or other requirement to use this house, but the Orcs of the stronghold won\'t trade or speak with you unless you are accepted by them first.  For more info on being accepted as an Orc clan member, visit the following page:

http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Forgemaster\'s_Fingers

------ Upcoming features ------

You\'ll notice that the bookshelves in the basement are currently not functional. This is due to the Creation Kit crashing every time I try to place the required pieces to get it to work.  The same goes for mannequins and wall plaques, which will also be coming in a later version.

I\'ll be adding a fire pit and cooking pot somewhere, either on the first floor or out on the balcony.

It\'s been brought to my attention that followers can\'t come inside.  I don\'t have a problem with this because I think it would be too cramped with another person inside, but I can make it work if enough people want it.

------ Install Instructions ------

Just drop the .esp file in your Skyrim/Data/ directory, and activate it via the launcher.  To uninstall, delete the .esp.

Feel free to use the Nexus Mod Manager instead, if you wish.

------ Thank you ------

Thanks for your interest, and I hope you enjoy your new Orcish home!
author: Elvani

files.name: Home Sweet Stronghold v1_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
Finished furnishing the basement.
Added first-floor decorations and clutter.

files.name: Home Sweet Stronghold v0_9_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed some messed up terrain outside the stronghold. Good as new now!
Trapdoor now leads to an empty basement.

files.name: Home Sweet Stronghold v0_9_0
files.changelogHtml:
First version uploaded to SkyrimNexus.
Bed, containers, and exterior are functional.
No basement, enchantment table, bookshelves or weapon rack yet.
